alert.note: Alert for Alexander; Pulaski (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 12:19PM CST until January 13 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky...Illinois...Indiana... Ohio River at Olmsted Lock and Dam. Ohio River at Mount Vernon. Ohio River at Shawneetown. Ohio River at J.T. Myers Dam. Ohio River at Newburgh Dam. Ohio River at Paducah. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky...Illinois...Missouri... Ohio River at Golconda. Ohio River at Cairo. .Heavy rainfall and recent snow melt will continue to keep water levels on the lower Ohio River in or near minor flood this week. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Cairo. * WHEN...From late tonight to late Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...At 40.0 feet, Minor flooding occurs affecting mainly agricultural bottomland and low lying areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM CST Sunday the stage was 39.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 41.0 feet Wednesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Thursday afternoon. - Flood stage is 40.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
